addRadioButton

public USimpleGUI addRadioButton(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String[] labels,
                                 float w)
Adds a group of radio buttons name, built using the strings from the labels array.

Parameters:
name - Name of RadioButton group
labels - Array of button labels, each one of which will become a radio button
w - Width of RadioButton group
Returns:
Reference to this USimpleGUI instance

setHorizontalLayout

setLayout

public void setLayout(boolean vertical)
Calculates actual positions of components based on whether a vertical or horizontal layout is requested. setLayout() should always be called to complete the GUI setup. Calls to newRow() will be interpreted as blank spaces in a vertical layout, in a horizontal one it will cause following components to appear on a new row.

Parameters:
vertical -
